content.description: Short route with crux move over a small roof.  Crux move is protected by bolt above roof
content.protection: Four bolts on the face with a 5th bolt which is used as a directional to get to the two-bolt anchor.
content.location: Farthest right bolted route on Southwest Face

content.description: Easy climbing for 15 feet leads to the first bolt.  From here pass a couple of juggy lodestones past two more bolts to top
content.protection: Three protection bolts on the face with a 4th bolt which is a directional to get to the two-bolt anchor.
content.location: To the left of the Southwest Face Middle route and right of the small gully.

content.description: Face climbing past two bolts leads to a mild bulge with a 10a move.  From here climbing eases up to the chains.
content.protection: 4 bolts on the face with a 5th bolt which can be used as a directional to get to the anchors.
content.location: Bolted route to the left of the Southwest Face Right.

content.description: TR route on sub-pinnacle to the left of Gertie's Pinnacle. Fun warm up on big knobs and holds.
content.protection: Two bolts (old) with quick links up top (access through a 5.4 chimney on the right of the climb). Can sling a huge rock next to the bolts (long webbing) as a back up to the bolts.
content.location: Far left when facing all the climbs on Gertie's.
